body.name: Dash Air Fryer Recipe Book for Healthier + Delicious Meals, Snacks & Desserts, Over 70+ Easy to Follow Guides, Cookbook
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 27 mins
features: 75 RECIPES: Delicious healthy appetizers, meals, and desserts are just a page flip away with our full color, easy to follow cookbook and recipe guide
HEALTHIER FRIED FOOD: Dash Air Fryers use AirCrisp technology (instead of oil) to help reduce added fat by 70-80%, without sacrificing the flavor of your fried food
VERSATILE: There is a recipe for everyone - tacos, burgers, fries, donuts, cheesecakes, fries, wings and more!
PERFECT GIFT: The Dash Air Fryer companion recipe book is the perfect stocking stuffer or add-on gift for Christmas, birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion
DASH AIR FRYER COMPANION: Use in conjunction with any of the air fryers by Dash: compact, compact digital or deluxe Available in a variety of colors to match any kitchen décor
U.S. BASED SUPPORT: Dash is a U.S. based company who provides contact information in each product manual
body.description: Get started cooking healthy, delicious meals and ingredients with the latest cookbook from Dash: Air Frying For Everyone. From appetizers to yummy desserts, this cookbook gets you experimenting with healthier ways to fry. Choose from a wide variety of delicious recipes that are simple to make, whether for a weeknight dinner or a special occasion. The air fryer cookbook has it all!

productInformation.value: #85,493 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #280 in Air Fryers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My initial impression
reviews.reviewText: I just received this cookbook in the mail. I haven't made anything from it yet, but I have read it completely. I have to say, initially, I'm impressed! There are a lot of good recipes in here, and they cover a lot of ground! This is NOT a vegetarian cookbook, nor does it claim to be. There are SOME vegetarian recipes, with many more, mostly fish and chicken, that one could easily make vegetarian or possibly vegan. I say this because I ordered the book not really knowing what to expect, and I'm quite pleased with the selection. There are even some international and Southern recipes in here, such as non fried hush puppies, which I'm really looking forward to!In my opinion, this is a great cookbook for beginners, such as college students, or for people downsizing but who still want to be able to make nice recipes. The preparations seem very straightforward and explanatory, and the smaller quantities are sized for this demographic in particular. I look forward to begin using the book!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Variety of Recipes!
reviews.reviewText: So glad I purchased the additional cookbook, for the Dash Fryer comes with ten recipes. This additional cookbook is wonderful. You get a lot of different recipes which I love, from appetizers, to main dishes to desserts. They are easy to make. At times the frying time is a little off, do to the size of what your frying and personal taste, but I write my notes right in the cookbook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its compact and cute!
reviews.reviewText: Extremely easy to use. Works well for small portions. Affordable, compact, perfect for one to two portions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good recipes with a lot of variety!
reviews.reviewText: I recommend this air fryer cookbook and easy to follow recipes! I’m new at using the air fryer and these helped me! Cant wait to try more! I’ve made four from this book started slow sweet potatoe fries and chick peas asparagus chicken wings and will try more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so disappointed in this overpriced cookbook. I was hoping for "Betty Crocker" recipes with a few "Julia Child" ones since I'm new to using an air fryer. Most of the recipes are not what I was looking for. I wanted basics and this was not that. I'm returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This cookbook has many easy to make recipes for your airfryer. but use cautiously because different fryers heat differently but this is a great book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The newness wears off fast.
reviews.reviewText: There are some things that just don’t work well in an air fryer. One of them being warming up bread. Not a good idea.
